title: A learned and very useful commentary on the whole epistle to the Hebrews wherein every word and particle in the original is explained ... : being the substance of thirty years Wednesdayes lectures at Black-fryers, London / by that holy and learned divine Wiliam Gouge ... : before which is prefixed a narrative of his life and death : whereunto is added two alphabeticall tables ...
author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by A.M., T.W. and S.G. for Joshua Kirton,
